users: Contains user information. Columns: id (primary key), name (full name), email, created_at (registration date)
orders: Contains order records. Columns: id, user_id (foreign key to users), product_id (foreign key to products), quantity, order_date, status (pending/completed/cancelled)
products: Contains product catalog. Columns: id, name, description, price, category (electronics/clothing/food), stock_quantity
